1438652150796722180.content:
The best use of your time in crypto is building.

To invest — Build to develop intuition
To trade — Build bots
To find a job — Build projects to show off
To start a company — Build the MVP
To learn — Build to understand
To research — Build a PoC
To meet people — Build with others

1438650016281751552.name: Hunter Horsley
1438650016281751552.content:
Crypto sits at the intersection of 3 mega trends:

1. Financial: rise of alts, decline of 60/40

2. Tech: software eating old industries, proliferation of open source

3. Social/organizational: declining trust in govt & private institutions, concern over privacy

Giant tailwinds
